title: Thanks for remembering that Lucian exists Riot
body:
With the latest PBE buff his Q cast time goes down to like half the usual at level 18 and it feels smooth as butter 
https://puu.sh/ta9xb/e4e113090c.png

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HN5FrjER,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-25T13:30:32.060+0000)
>
> Swiggity Swooty.

Run or I will steal that booty
jesus christ that spashart (And im not even christian but I need that guy to help me)

> [{quoted}](name=Craft Zeppelin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HN5FrjER,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-25T13:20:10.107+0000)
>
> jesus christ that spashart (And im not even christian but I need that guy to help me)

Yes, that splash is exactly why the boards and reddit had a collective "WTF RIOT"

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HN5FrjER,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-25T13:22:15.592+0000)
>
> Yes, that splash is exactly why the boards and reddit had a collective "WTF RIOT"

I thought my main champ velkoz looked less disturbing than this

> [{quoted}](name=Craft Zeppelin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HN5FrjER,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-25T15:35:51.756+0000)
>
> I thought my main champ velkoz looked less disturbing than this

one's a tenticle hentai monster.
the others a pedophile.

so which one is disturbiing?
I upvote cause I like your choice in names.
Are you from the KKK Clan? I heard those are some nasty people in the league community.

> [{quoted}](name=Tychusfindlay919,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HN5FrjER,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-25T16:51:18.601+0000)
>
> Are you from the KKK Clan? I heard those are some nasty people in the league community.

Huh?  Me?  Heavens no, I'm just saying what it looks like to me.
what does it look like to you?

i mean, i can understand about how someone would assume you racist, but you didnt mention skin color at all. i'd like to think just assuming someone saying something like this in relation to the face and not the skin color, is a bit of a hypocrite take on anyone. 

the only thing that i can think of that raises some racist comments is "run from the police", but at the same time its no denying that most "thugs" in the "hood" are black, so i dont see the problem.

I honestly think he needs a lower cd on E and a buff to his ultimate and he'll be at a 50% win rate instead of 45%. I main him and I love him and i hate to see he's the weakest pick in the meta rn :( buff pls
Is it still dodgable is the question.
That splash art shall be Lollipoopy's right hand man. Together, they will be unstoppable.
Does it still have the animation at the end? It should, gives Luci better skill expression.
